mapper.select: select info_user.id, info_user.name, info_user.phone, info_user.role_id, info_user.depart_id, (select role_name from dic_role where dic_role.role_id = info_user.role_id) as role_name, (select depart_name from dic_depart where dic_depart.depart_id = info_user.depart_id) as depart_name from info_user ORDER BY id;
SELECT count(1) FROM INFO_USER WHERE id = #{id};
